entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-06-03
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Query/Json: additional small fixes for JSON escaping #33886
    9.0.0
  • Fix case-insensitive logic for column names in SQL queries #33885
    Backlog
  • Is it possible to manually track new entity objects in a query expression? #33884
  • I keep getting: The foreign key property 'Vehicle.CustomerId1' was created in shadow state because a conflicting property with the simple name 'CustomerId' exists in the entity type #33883
  • Cosmos: Non-generic Find/FindAsync on DbContext is not translated to ReadItem #33881
    9.0.0
  • Query/Test: consider splitting GearsOfWar test suite, so that only tests with actual inheritance run in TPT and TPC modes #33878

Closed

  • Invalid optimization of `CASE op WHEN` expressions #33867
    9.0.0
  • JSON path is not properly formatted. #33443
    9.0.0
  • 'Contains' on Value Types / Different Behavior of Like and ILike #33827
  • Query: incorrect results for complex predicate with bitwise AND operation with bool args #30245
    9.0.0

PullRequests

Created

  • [SMALL] Fix to #33886 - Query/Json: additional small fixes for JSON escaping #33888
  • Generate KeyValueFactory and related instances in the compiled model. #33887

Merged

  • Fix optimization of `CASE op WHEN` #33869
  • Fix to #33443 - JSON path is not properly formatted #33771
  • Bump Microsoft.Data.SqlClient from 5.2.0 to 5.2.1 #33882
    area-infrastructure, type-dependency update :arrow_up_small:
  • Fix and enable `Bitwise_and_on_expression_with_like_and_null_check_being_compared_to_false` #33872
  • Translate logical Boolean operators as conditional Boolean operators #33873

Updated

  • Translate ToString() over enums #33706
  • Translate non-aggregate string.Join to CONCAT_WS on SQL Server #28900
  • Various stuff from EFCore.PG JSON work #32255
  • Fix SQL Server translation of `IndexOf` #33876
  • Fix for #33702 Translation for the SQL Server PATINDEX function #33868
  • TrimStart and TrimEnd with optional char array implementation for SQL Server #33715
  • Feature/translate json functions #29306 #30010
  • Fix `unhex()` nullability #33870
  • Fix to #33073 - JSON columns throws Invalid token type: 'StartObject' exception with AsNoTrackingWithIdentityResolution() #33101
  • OTEL implementation, so far matching EventCounters infrastructure. #33633
  • Precompiled query inner loop source generator #33350
  • Allow SqlFragmentExpression to have Type/type mapping #33053
  • Use provider discriminator values for OfType() #32878
